name: Hamgame
description:
Hey there! Be a hamster! Eat those seeds! Avoid that cat!

(Enjoy our little warmup for next week's Global Game Jam)

Programmed by Kike Perez @kikepdev    ||   Art by Cam Gonzalez @prideling

Music obtained from Inompetech (https://filmmusic.io:)
"Doobly Doo" by Kevin MacLeod 
"Delightful D" by Kevin MacLeod
